testcase.classname: Demonstration of separation from directly returning a redirection status code, in that some browsers cannot handle a raw redirect status code without a destination page as part of the HTTP response.
testcase.name: Redirect Link
testcase.system-out: Given a user is on the website home page....................................passed When user clicks on Redirect Link...........................................passed And user clicks link to trigger the redirect................................passed Then test listed status codes...............................................passed
